io.micronaut.serde.json.stream

Class JsonParserDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.serde.support.AbstractStreamDecoder
      • io.micronaut.serde.json.stream.JsonParserDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decoder, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JsonParserDecoder
extends AbstractStreamDecoder
    Implementation of the Decoder interface for JSON-P.

      • skipChildren

        protected void skipChildren()
        Description copied from class: AbstractStreamDecoder
        If we are at a AbstractStreamDecoder.TokenType.START_OBJECT or AbstractStreamDecoder.TokenType.START_ARRAY, skip to the matching AbstractStreamDecoder.TokenType.END_OBJECT or AbstractStreamDecoder.TokenType.END_ARRAY. Else, do nothing.
        Specified by:
